name: Ringroad
shortDetails: Waytoplay Original RINGROAD 12pcs - Way to play Car Track Ring Road.
description: The affordable waytoplay Ringroad is a great toy for imaginative play. Watch your children create their very own circuits and road maps for their favourite toys and vehicles. Flexible, durable road toy, 170cm length 8 curves, 2 straights, 1 intersection and 1 roundabout. Expand your road by purchasing additional sets later Can be used on almost any surface, inside or outside Easy to connect parts Encourages imaginative play Great to combine with other toys

name: King of the Road
shortDetails: Waytoplay Original KING OF THE ROAD 40 PCS - Way to play Track King of The Road.
description: If you want to be King of the Road, this is your set! It contains no less than 40 parts for maximum fun for everyone. This set is big and is highly recommended for kids that really love to play with cars but also for use at schools and daycare centers.  Flexible, durable road toy, 648cm length 16 curves, 16 straights, 4 intersections and 4 roundabouts Expand your road by purchasing additional sets later Can be used on almost any surface, inside or outside Easy to connect parts Encourages imaginative play Great to combine with other toys

name: 24-Piece Set
shortDetails: Magnetic Wooden Blocks Tegu Classics. The 24-Piece Set is a medium building set that allows for big and tall creations.
description: The 24-Piece Set is a medium building set that allows for big and tall creations. Includes 24 blocks in 6 shapes: 4 medium columns, 4 mega planks, 6 long planks, 4 short planks, 4 cubes and 2 parallelograms.

name: 14-Piece Set
shortDetails: Magnetic Wooden Blocks Tegu Classics.
description: The 14-Piece Set is an introductory building set, perfect for getting to know and love the Tegu magnetic wooden block system. Includes 14 blocks in 5 shapes: 2 medium columns, 4 long planks, 4 short planks, 2 cubes and 2 parallelograms.

name: SumBlox Educational Set
shortDetails: Working together to build the largest tower, or to solve more difficult equations is a great way to develop communication between children using the SumBlox Educational Set.
description: A large set of 100 solid hard beech wood SumBlox and 4 Supplemental Math Curriculum lesson books. The Educational Set of 100-wooden math blocks is designed for one child or small groups of children. To allow them to explore concepts such as multiplication, division and fractions. The books are developed to assist parents/teachers/guardians and guide kids to enjoy games that will further develop their math skills and enhance their interactions with the blocks.

name: SumBlox Basic Set
shortDetails: The Basic Set of SumBlox provides a good number of blocks to start working on different kinds of math problems with your children.
description: A Basic Set of 43 Solid Hard Beech Wood SumBlox with 4 Activity Cards & Math Guide. The 43-block set is designed for 1 or 2 kids below age 6, learning simple arithmetic skills.

name: SumBlox Starter Set
shortDetails: A great accessory for Montessori or Waldorf classrooms.
description: The Starter Set is the perfect way to begin using SumBlox at home. A Starter Set of 27 SumBlox solid wood educational counting blocks to develop fundamental math skills.

name: Counting with Colors
shortDetails: Grimm's Counting With Colours
description: Learning to count, complete sums, memorise prime numbers and master the times tables is made easy with this incredible wooden maths toy. This 200-piece block set is ideal for home educators but will be a hit with any parent looking for educational toys. The 200 wooden blocks sit in a tray in two layers - the tray is handy for storage and for containing the blocks when learning. The blocks can be used in a wide variety of ways - from the first attempts at learning numbers to making out simple sums and more.

name: Large Rainbow
shortDetails: Grimm's Large Rainbow 12 pieces
description: This enormous wooden rainbow might just be the most amazing thing in your playroom. The possibilities for creative play are endless with this gorgeous wooden rainbow and the 12 blocks can be used in a myriad of ways - as tunnels and bridges for cars, cots for baby dolls, animal shelters or farm fences. They are even big enough for small children to crawl through and can be spread out to make mermaid tails for their young owners, and balanced one on top of another to make elaborate sculptures. Steiner educators, nurseries and playgroups will love how this natural toy can be used throughout the day in numerous ways.

name: Large Rainbow Pastel
shortDetails: Grimm's Large Pastel Rainbow Tunnel 12 pieces
description: Grimm's Large Pastel Rainbow Tunnel is absolutely versatile and an ideal toy even for the smallest child. Toddlers can stack, sort and build and children can use it as a cradle for dolls, as a fence for animals, or a tunnel, as a bridge for vehicles, a house for dwarfs and dolls. The possibilities with the world famous Grimm's Rainbows are endless and it is by far the most open-ended toy available. It will always be a toy that integrates play with the use of imagination and fantasy.

name: Mandala pink flowers
shortDetails: Grapat Mandala Pink Flowers
description: The Grapat Mandala Pink Flowers is truly versatile and encourages open ended play. Designed in order to create a unique sensory experience, you can create beautiful mandala designs which encourage the development of fine motor skills as well as teaching little ones about symmetry. The possibilities are endless. Grapat Mandala sets are also brilliant for role play, counting and sorting. Grapat Mandala Pink Flowers include 36 mini flowers in 3 different shades of pink. Each item is about 4 cm.

name: Mandala three fires
shortDetails: Grapat Mandala Red Fire
description: The Grapat Mandala Red Fire is truly versatile and encourages open ended play. Designed in order to create a unique sensory experience, you can create beautiful mandala designs which encourage the development of fine motor skills as well as teaching little ones about symmetry. The possibilities are endless. Grapat Mandala sets are also brilliant for role play, counting and sorting. Grapat Mandala Red Fire include 36 mini flames in 3 different shades of red. Each item is about 4 cm.

name: Mandala Drops of water
shortDetails: Grapat Mandala Drops of Water
description: Grapat mandala pieces in the shape of little raindrops are going to make an amazing addition to your play collection. Use to decorate a scene and signify that it's raining, make rivers, splashes or anything else water related these really are perfect for imaginative play. Of course these rain drops are wonderful for mandala making too, add the element of water to your art. Sure to inspire all kinds of creativity and fire up imaginations young and old.

name: Full Flock
shortDetails: Flockmen Full Flock 32 pieces
description: What's in the Flockmen Box? Your set of 32 Flockmen awaits you: each wooden ‘man’ is 50mm wide, 70mm tall and 15mm thick. Each individual Flockmen is designed to be impossible to swallow so it is safe to play with around babies. Portable storage bag: A practical and reinforced natural linen drawstring storage bag to keep your Flockmen safely stored when not in use. An inspiration card: with ideas and resources for how to challenge yourself with Flockmen.

name: Mega Flock (100pcs)
shortDetails: Flockmen Mega Flock 100 pieces
description: What's in the Flockmen Box? Your set of 100 Flockmen awaits you: each wooden ‘man’ is 50mm wide, 70mm tall and 15mm thick. Each individual Flockmen is designed to be impossible to swallow so it is safe to play with around babies. Portable storage bag: You’ll receive a large practical and reinforced natural linen drawstring storage bag to keep your Flockmen safely stored when not in use. An inspiration card: with ideas and resources for how to challenge yourself with Flockmen.

name: Half Flock (16pcs)
shortDetails: Flockmen Half Flock 16 pieces
description: What's in the Flockmen Box? Your set of 16 Flockmen awaits you: each wooden ‘man’ is 50mm wide, 70mm tall and 15mm thick. Each individual Flockmen is designed to be impossible to swallow so it is safe to play with around babies. Portable storage bag: A practical and reinforced natural linen drawstring storage bag to keep your Flockmen safely stored when not in use. An inspiration card: with ideas and resources for how to challenge yourself with Flockmen.

name: 24 Piece Car Pack.jpg
shortDetails: 24 Piece Car Pack
description: Our 24 piece car pack featuring Strong Magnets, Rubber Wheels and our Unique Beveled Design Each set includes: 2 Cars with Rubber Wheels 12 x Small squares 8 x Rectangle pieces 2 x Hollow square pieces (door frames) Idea Booklet

name: Connetix Tiles 100 Piece Set
shortDetails: Connetix Tiles 100 Piece Set
description: Our 100 Piece set comprises 6 large tiles, making your buildings even BIGGER! Each set includes: 6 x Large squares (6×6 inch) 36 x Small squares 12 x Equilateral triangles 12 x Right angle triangles 12 x Isosceles triangles 6 x Window square pieces 6 x Hollow square pieces (door frames) 4 x Rectangles 6 x Square gates Idea Booklet A Bag to hold it all in!

name: Connetix Tiles 62 Piece Set
shortDetails: Connetix Tiles 62 Piece Set
description: Our 62 Piece set comprises 4 large tiles, making building BIG even easier! Each set includes: 4 x Large squares (6×6 inch) 24 x Small squares 12 x Equilateral triangles 8 x Right angle triangles 6 x Isosceles triangles 4 x Window square pieces 4 x Hollow square pieces (door frames) Idea Booklet

name: The Lighthouse Puzzle block
shortDetails: The Lighthouse Puzzle block
description: The Lighthouse Puzzle is a unique toy which has both puzzling and building functions.  It has 21 blocks with different shapes and blocks. Every block was cut, sanded and painted by hand from a solid wood.  And they have very smooth warm feeling, that help children's sensory development.  We use limewood and water based wax color to keep the original velvety feeling of wood, it also keeps the wood pattern visible. Our lighthouse puzzle is great for imaginative and open-ended play.

name: Fire Stacker
shortDetails: Fire stacker
description: Spark your little one's imagination with our Exclusive Fire Stacker from Avdar Toys. Sort, stack and tell stories around this highly detailed and hand-finished stacking campfire. Perfect for Small World play, the individual pieces will become houses, fences or anything else that a lit-up imagination can come up with.

name: Rainbow Stacker
shortDetails: Big Rainbow Stacker
description: We've partnered with Avdar toys to bring you this gorgeous small rainbow stacker that will become the centre of your little one's open-ended play (or the centrepiece of a drool-worthy #toyshelfie). This deluxe item is crafted from high quality wood and carefully treated with a carefully selected non-toxic finish. It's simply the best small stacker there is!

name: Animal set
shortDetails: Five Wooden Animals by Avdar
description: A set of five adorable natural wood animals. Adopt these stackable creatures and bring them home! Add them to your seasonal tables or small world playscapes, or enjoy them on their own. Can you name all five!? Each animal stands 5-7cm tall.

name: Rainbow house blocks
shortDetails: Rainbow House Blocks by Avdar Toys
description: Now we're blockin'! Rainbow coloured House Blocks by Avdar will take your open-ended play to a new level. Sort or stack them on their own, or combine them with other materials to create a whole neighbourhood of colourful fun. When it comes to beautiful, engaging wooden play materials, these montessori-inspired Rainbow House Blocks by Avdar really stack up! House Size: Approx 5cm (height) Materials: Lime wood, water-based non-toxic paint

name: Wave stacker
shortDetails: Stacking Wave Blocks by Avdar Toys
description: Wave hello to our eight piece Wave Blocks set by Avdar. Four gently rippling waves and four colourful fishes play together in this set, which can be sorted or stacked any way that you can imagine. There's something fishy about this beautiful open-ended Montessori-inspired wooden play set, 'water' you going to build with it? Dimensions: 7 x 11 x 2cm

name: Sensory Play Stones
shortDetails: Ideal for sensory play, these beautifully sculpted animals will charm your youngest learners. The set consists of eight tactile figures: a bear, an owl, a bird, a whale, a fish, an elephant, a mouse and a rabbit (1–3'' high). the animals can be sorted and matched by different criteria, including color, Habitat and characteristics, promoting Language and discussion. Each piece is crafted from our unique stone mix and can be used outside. Why not build habitats for the animals: a Nest for the bird, a River for the fish, an Icy Ocean for the bear. Children will enjoy creating a character for each creature, making the set ideal for storytelling activities and block play. These engaging animals will be a great springboard to Learning more about life in the Wild, what animals are in your own environment and how the children might better care for them.
description: These large stones are designed to enable children to have sensory experiences by experimenting with the raised and indented shapes and patterns. Cast from a durable mix of resin and real stone, they can be used on their own or as part of a wider sensory experience incorporating messy play. Each stone in this set of eight measures 75mm and include four raised/bumpy designs (circles, dots, wavy lines, and a grid) and four indented/hollow designs (circles, lines, zigzags, and a spiral). Age 18mths+. Sensory Stones are part of our popular range of learning pebbles, designed to offer children tactile early learning experiences.

name: Sensory Play Stones: Vegetables
shortDetails: These sturdy vegetable stones offer the perfect ingredients for creative cookery in the mud kitchen, or for inspired role play (indoors or out)!  Boiled, roasted, fried or steamed, the vegetables can be used to make all sorts of dishes: soups, stews, salads or stir fries. As sliced vegetables, children can see how the beautiful sculptures compare to the real thing. Set includes eight vegetables: tomato, pak choi, onion, peas, carrot, mushroom, cucumber and broccoli.  Measures 50-80mm. Age 2+.
description: Colourful Sensory Vegetable Play Stones from Yellow Door.  Sturdy vegetable stones from Yellow Door.  The stones offer the perfect ingredients for creative cookery in any mud kitchen, or for inspired role play (indoors or out)!  Boiled, roasted, fried or steamed, the vegetables can be used to make all sorts of dishes.  As sliced vegetables, children can see how the beautiful sculptures compare to the real thing. Set includes eight vegetables: tomato, pak choi, onion, peas, carrot, mushroom, cucumber and broccoli. 1. Set of 8 play vegetables 2. Made from a stone & resin mix 3. Size 50-80mm 4. Age 2+

name: Alphabet Pebbles - Lowercase
shortDetails: Smooth Rocks with one engraved Lowercase letter on each of the 26 pebbles. All store in a plastic jar with screw-on lid. 26 PC. Set. Ages 3 Years. +.
description: Take a hands-on approach to learning letters with our tactile Alphabet Pebbles. Specially cast from our unique stone and resin mix, these popular alphabet pebbles appeal to children’s instinct to explore, investigate, sort and collect. They are durable enough to be used in sand, water and outdoors. Each pebble is engraved and painted with a letter, and will not fade over time. Yellow Door Lowercase Alphabet Pebbles, great for outdoor play.  The pebbles are really tactile and making learning fun.  The Alphabet Pebbles are cast from unique stone and resin mix.  The pebbles appeal to children’s instinct to explore, investigate, sort and collect. They can be used in sand, water and outdoors. 1. Each pebble is engraved and painted with a letter, and will not fade over time. 2. Pebbles measure between 30–45mm.3. Safe for age 2+.

name: Alphabet Pebbles - Word-building Set
shortDetails: Take a hands-on approach to learning letters with our tactileAlphabet Pebbles. Specially cast from our unique stone and resin mix, these popular alphabet pebbles appeal to children’s instinct to explore, investigate, sort and collect.
description: Yellow Door Word Building Set, contains three of each vowel and two of b, c, d, f, g, h, l, m, n, p, r, s, t, y and one of j, k, q, v, w, x, z..  The pebbles are really tactile and making learning fun.  The Pebbles are cast from unique stone and resin mix.  The pebbles appeal to children’s instinct to explore, investigate, sort and collect. They can be used in sand, water and outdoors. Each pebble is engraved and painted with a letter, and will not fade over time. Pebbles measure between 30 and 45mm. 1. Safe for age 2+ 2. Word Building Set includes 50 letter pebbles

name: Alphabet Pebbles - Uppercase
shortDetails: Introduce uppercase letters with these original manipulatives. Each pebble is engraved with a capital letter and hand-painted. If you are looking for ways to introduce the alphabet playfully and promote outdoor learning then this original resource will be a great find. Looking and feeling like real rocks, these pebbles are great for learning in the sand, in the water and outdoors. The set includes 26 pebbles with letters A-Z and a leaflet of ideas for using them. Each pebble measures about 1 and a half inches across., Tactile pebbles with lots of play and learning value, Ideal for letter recognition, Contains 26 pebbles each engraved with an uppercase letter.
description: Yellow Door Lowercase Alphabet Pebbles, great for outdoor play.  The pebbles are really tactile and making learning fun.  The Alphabet Pebbles are cast from unique stone and resin mix.  The pebbles appeal to children’s instinct to explore, investigate, sort and collect. They can be used in sand, water and outdoors. 1. Each pebble is engraved and painted with a letter, and will not fade over time. 2. Pebbles measure between 30–45mm. 3. Safe for age 2+.

name: Let's Investigate - Woodland Footprints
shortDetails: This set of engaging woodland footprints is a great way for children to start their woodland explorations!
description: This set of engaging woodland footprints is a great way for children to start their woodland explorations! Each set includes footprints for a fox, squirrel, rabbit, frog, deer, buzzard, owl, and mouse. The footprint stones can be sorted by categories such as homes, feathers, claws, and diet. Children can record their findings by taking rubbings, making impressions in play dough, and investigating what else they can find out about each animal. When the work is done, the children can give the footprints a good clean with soap and water before a new woodland adventure.  The footprints are made from a unique stone mix and are robust enough to be used throughout an early years setting, both inside and outdoors. Contains eight double-sided stones (70–80mm). Age 2+.

name: Let's Investigate - Fossils
shortDetails: Set of eight realistic and tactile specimens, including ammonite, clam shell, fern leaf, preserved leaves, sea urchin, shark’s tooth, shrimp and trilobite. Made from a unique stone mix, they measure 3-3 1/2' and have a raised image on one side and an indention on the other.
description: Fossils inspire children’s imagination and excite young learners. They will delight in discovering and examining this set of eight attractive, realistic, and tactile specimens, including ammonite, clam shell, fern leaf, preserved leaves, sea urchin, shark’s tooth, shrimp, and trilobite. Made from a unique stone mix, they are robust enough to be used throughout an early years setting, both in an indoor and outdoor environment. Designed to fit snugly in small inquisitive hands (80-90mm), these fossils have huge potential for discovery, storytelling, and provide a great springboard to further activities. Go on a fossil hunt, discover them buried outside or in a sand tray, dig them up and clean them off. Record what’s been found by taking a wax rubbing and/or making a fossil imprint in modelling clay. They are also great for non-fiction research, the gathering of evidence, and the reaching of conclusions. The fossils can be used in further creative ways through the making of fossil gardens, displays of rubbings and clay imprints, and role play. These fossils are an ideal addition to any dinosaur theme and can be used in endless small-world and role-play activities. Age 2+.

name: Let's Investigate - Bugs
shortDetails: Cast from a special stone mix, this set includes eight critters (ant, beetle, butterfly, centipede, dragonfly, ladybug, spider and pill bug), each measuring 3. 2’’ with a raised image on one side and an indention on the other.
description: Support children’s growing understanding of the world with this engaging and realistic set of eight bugs. Featuring an ant, beetle, butterfly, centipede, dragonfly, ladybird, spider, and woodlouse, this fascinating set of eight bugs provides children with the opportunity to learn close up about the living creatures they will encounter in daily life without them scuttling or flying away! Insects and creepy crawlies open up the outdoor space in a fascinating way as children are drawn into the life that is going on right under their noses. Go on a bug hunt, study any finds discovered outside, brush them off and clean them up. Make a record of what’s been found by taking a wax rubbing and/or making an imprint in modelling clay. Able to fit well in small hands, these bugs will inspire children’s imagination and excite young learners in their non-fiction research. Ideal for investigative play, they can be used to inspire the making of bug homes. A fantastic addition to any investigative play provision, these bugs are one of our best sellers.

name: Let's Investigate - Farmyard Footprints
shortDetails: Each double-sided stone has the raised footprint of an animal on one side and an image of the animal indented into the other side. Press the footprint into sand, mud or soil and create a trail for children to follow. What animal might they find at the end: cow, horse, sheep, pig, dog, cat, chicken or duck? They can record their findings by taking rubbings and making impressions in play dough. When the work is done, the children can give the footprints a good clean with soap and water, before a new farmyard adventure tomorrow.
description: There are always plenty of animals to see down on the farm, but sometimes you need to follow their footprints to find them. Each double-sided stone has the raised footprint of an animal on one side and an image of the animal indented into the other side. Press the footprint into sand, mud, or soil and create a trail for children to follow. What animal might they find at the end: cow, horse, sheep, pig, dog, cat, chicken, or duck? When they find the animals, how might they sort them? Children can record their findings by taking rubbings, making impressions in play dough, and discovering what else they know or can find out about each animal. When the work is done, the children can give the footprints a good clean with soap and water, before a new farmyard adventure tomorrow. Made from a unique stone mix, the footprints are robust enough to be used throughout an early years setting including outdoors. Contains eight double-sided stones (70-80mm). Age 2+.

name: Let's Investigate - Dinosaur Footprints
shortDetails: Beware – the dinosaurs are coming! Our latest edition to the footprints range is guaranteed to excite children’s curiosity and capture their imagination.
description: Each stone shows a dinosaur footprint on one side and its owner on the other. Perfect to encourage early investigation skills as children examine, compare and sort the eight footprints: Apatosaurus, Deinonychus, Hypsilophodon, Iguanodon, Quetzalcoatlus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops and Tyrannosaurus Rex. Children will enjoy making crayon rubbings, impressions in play dough, footprint trails, and comparing the different shapes of the footprints and characteristics of the dinosaurs. Made from our unique stone mix, they are durable for use outdoors: in mud, sand, water, or soil. Contains 8 double-sided stones (90 x 60mm). Age 3+.

name: Let's Investigate - Safari Footprints
shortDetails: Take a walk on the wild side with our latest addition to our footprints range of stones. Explore the kind of animals you might find on the African savannah as you follow their tracks.
description: Take a walk on the wild side with our latest addition to our footprints range of stones. Explore the kind of animals you might find on the African savannah as you follow their tracks. Each stone has a raised footprint on one side and the related creature indented on the other side. Watch out for the following animals: lion, elephant, rhinoceros, giraffe, hippopotamus, ostrich, cheetah, and zebra. This range of wild animals will inspire lots of discussion about the food they might eat or whether they are endangered. Ideal to prompt talk about conservation and how children relate to the natural world. Contains eight double-sided stones measuring 80mm. 1. Contains 8 double-sided footprint stones made from a resin/stone mix 2. Size 80 x 70mm 3. Age 2+

name: Let's Investigate - Polar Footprints
shortDetails: This set of engaging woodland footprints is a great way for children to start their woodland explorations! Each set includes a footprint for a fox, squirrel, rabbit, frog, deer, hawk, owl and mouse. The footprint stones can be sorted by categories such as feathers, claws, diet. Children can record their findings by taking rubbings, making impressions in play clay and investigating what else they can find out about each animal. When the work is done, the children can give the footprints a good clean with soap and water before a new woodland adventure. The footprints are made from a unique stone mix and are robust enough to be used throughout an early childhood environment, both inside and outdoors. Contains eight double-sided stones (3'' approx.)., This set of engaging woodland footprints is a great way for children to start their woodland explorations!, They can record their findings by taking rubbings, making impressions in play dough, creating prints using paints and investigating what else they can find out about each animal, Great to support early STEM.
description: These chilly footprints will encourage interest in the fascinating wildlife that inhabits our frozen polar landscapes. Including animals from the Arctic and Antarctica, these stones are perfect for fostering an understanding of our fragile natural world and promoting a commitment to protecting it. Each stone features a raised footprint on one side and its owner on the other. Contains eight double-sided footprint stones: polar bear, reindeer, wolf, musk ox, arctic fox, arctic hare, albatross and penguin. Age 3+. The footprints are made from a unique stone mix and are robust enough to be used throughout an early years setting, both inside and outdoors.

name: Natural Sorting Stones
shortDetails: Stones are a wonderful natural resource that children find hugely appealing. This satisfyingly smooth set of twelve tactile stones has been created to inspire children’s natural curiosity as they explore and sort.
description: Older children will enjoy sorting by colour, ordering by size, stacking, and matching whilst younger hands will simply like to hold and experience the different sizes and weights the set offers. Natural Sorting Stones are ideal for treasure baskets and sensory play activities and are also durable for use in sand, water, and outdoors. Each set includes twelve stones in three different sizes and four colours. The largest stone measures 80mm and the smallest measures 55mm. A useful bag is also included, ideal for introducing stones and for storage when the play is finished. 1. Contains 12 stones in 3 different sizes and 4 colours 2. Size between 55 - 80mm 3. Age 2+

name: 100pcs

shortDetails: Playmags 100 Piece Set: Now With Stronger Magnets, Sturdy,Super Durable With Vivid Clear Color Tiles. 18 Piece Clickins Accessories To Enhance Your Creativity
description: 1. 100 PIECE MAGNETIC TILE PLAY SET – This Playmags Classic Set Lets Kids Build, Play & Learn for Hours of Educational Entertainment; Recommended for Ages 3+ 2. EXTRA POWERFUL TILE MAGNETS – Set Includes 100 Magnetic tiles with Exclusive SUPERMAGS; Strong, Durable Magnets are Great for Building Tall 3D Structures 3. CLICKIN’S – LETTERS & WINDOWS FOR LEARNING – 18 Unique Instructive Clickins Pop Into Each Tile Window for Added Creativity; Kids & Toddlers Enjoy Many Possibilities 4. FOR EDUCATIONAL DEVELOPMENT – Engineering Toys Stimulate Problem Solving, Motor Skills & Shape Recognition; Perfect for Preschool Games & Group Activities 5. PLAY TIME VERSATILITY – Fun, Colorful, Engaging Set Makes a Wonderful Birthday or Christmas Gift for Boys or Girls; Use with Playmags Building Board, Cars & More

name: 28pcs Dome set
shortDetails: Playmags - 28 Piece Dome Set set! The 28 piece Playmags Dome Set includes new constructive pieces like 1/6 Domes and 1/2 Hexagon to stretch your child's imagination even further than the original magnetic tile set. Add magnetic 1/6 Dome to windows or any other piece from any other set to create a Dome for a castle.
description: 1. BOUNDLESS BUILDING: Playmags dome set includes 28 pieces in 3 different shapes that can combine to unlimited imaginations and as a great add on to any other set. 2. EDUCATIONAL TOY: Engineering toys stimulate problem solving, motor skills & shape recognition; Perfect for Preschool Games & Group Activities. 3. SUITABLE FOR ANYTIME: Playmags dome set is suitable for all ages (3+) by one party or in groups. Great way to spend quality time with family and loved ones. 4. OTHER MAGNETIC TILES: These Playmags tiles will work with any magnetic tile building toys. This can still be your first Playmags set. 5. CREATIVITY: Encourage creativity which is the key factor to success in today’s ever changing environment! The 28 piece Dome Set comes with unique pieces to stretch your child's imagination and offer even more hours of fun! Includes: 12 curves, 12 square frames and 4 trapeziums

name: 100 pcs+ 28pcs domeset
shortDetails: Bundle set of playmags 100 pcs+ 28pcs domeset
description: Playmags are our favourite magnetic tiles! These safe, sturdy and colourful constructive pieces ignite your child’s imagination and offer endless possibilities of play! Children will effortlessly learn through creative play about colours, shapes, symmetry, basic math, engineering and so much more! Safe and easy to manipulate as magnets connect well. Made with Supermags which are twice as strong! Super versatile and offer hours of open-ended play. Children can build anything they want! Clear colours are very attractive and look even better when light shines through ABC click-ins enhance early literacy skills. Window and balcony click-ins add nice details to creations. Honestly fun for the whole family! Children of varying ages can be engaged together - Younger children can recognize shapes, colours, letters, count and start with creating 2-D structures, while older children can build in 3-D, learn how to problem solve, persevere and build foundations well. A win for everyone!

name: New DELUXE Magnetic MightyMind
shortDetails: A POWERFUL MIND IS LAUNCHED IN JUST 30 CONNECTED STEPS. New, Deluxe Magnetic MightyMind is the latest edition to the unique 40 year old activity set that's been making kids smarter In 26 countries around the world. MightyMind is a launching pad. It's the FIRST STEP the beginning point for every child to acquire logical thinking skills. It's more than just a toy. As kids play with it, they develop a solid foundation that becomes a platform for building more complex skills. It precedes letter recognition, reading, math and STEM. Award winning MightyMind is a scientifically designed linear program that shows kids step by step how to solve and build puzzles from simple to complex. It's non-competitive, so every child succeeds. It's perfect for travel, because the magnets hold everything in place and kids get absorbed with it for hours. The new DELUXE edition is expandable. It's enlarged play tray will accommodate more MightyMind advanced puzzle patterns.
description: This wonderful game builds thinking skills, starting out easy and progressing to harder puzzles so younger kids can develop skills as they go to solve increasingly challenging puzzles. The basic MightyMind game contains a tray with 32 colorful plastic design tiles and 30 sturdy puzzle boards. The puzzles are numbered so you can easily spot their correct order. While the first puzzles consist of spaces to match single shapes to, the puzzles reach a point where they have just an outline, requiring children to experiment with different pieces until they find the correct combination in order to solve the puzzle. Children can work their way through the puzzles without help, all the while building puzzle-working skill and interest. MightyMind has received several awards, among them the Parent's Choice Honor award. A magnetic version of MightyMind is also available, which includes magnetic shapes and is packaged in a tin. Great for the road! SuperMind is a sequel for children who have successfully completed the MightyMind puzzles. It is available separately (in original or magnetic versions), or you can purchase just the design book, since the design tiles are identical to those in the first set. Extra Design Tiles are available, 32 colored tiles in each set, so more than one child can play at once. These are also great for use without pattern cards to create freeform designs.

name: Magnetic MightyMind
shortDetails: This latest addition to the magnetic MightyMind series presents an excellent transition from MightyMind to SuperMind. This unique group of carefully programmed puzzles is sequenced in alphabetical order. A child is lead step by step through a confidence building path moving from easy to complex challenges. For ages 4-9. MightyMind is a basic foundation activity toy. Every child in the world needs the skills it develops.
description: The ingenuity of MightyMind makes it a stand-out favorite with teachers & child development experts everywhere. It's an activity toy that develops the essential skills every child needs! Great for developing creativity, Mighty Mind helps children understand visual/spatial relationships. It's a great confidence builder in a fun, purposeful format. Children learn to solve puzzles entirely on their own! Starting with the simple concept of manipulating two half circles, the child creates a full circle. Then, by following a logical numerically programmed sequence of patterns, the child learns how to manipulate 32 geometric shapes to build pictures of increasing complexity. A rooster, a train, a frog, an owl, and more - There are so many fun shapes for children to build! Whether your child uses the enclosed pattern cards or designs his or her own figures, animals, people, buildings, and imaginative pictures - Increased skills will always result! This version of Mighty Mind has magnetic tiles. It contains 32 design tiles in 6 basic geometric shapes (4 colors, large & small sizes). These tiles are neatly stored in the convenient cotton storage pouch. Also included is a deck of 30 sturdy puzzle board cards which are organized and programmed in numerical sequence to show children how to build and solve puzzles. All items are enclosed in a handy storage tin - this Mightymind set is ideal for travel! Just the right level of challenge in problem solving & visual spatial experiences, plus predictable success, brilliant colors, and intriguing pictures to create on their own, Magnetic MightyMind creates nothing but great fun and smarter kids.

name: MAGNETIC MM CHALLENGER
shortDetails: This latest addition to the magnetic MightyMind series presents an excellent transition from MightyMind to SuperMind. This unique group of carefully programmed puzzles is sequenced in alphabetical order. A child is lead step by step through a confidence building path moving from easy to complex challenges.
description: MightyMind is a basic foundation activity toy. Every child in the world needs the skills it develops. MightyMind Mighty Mind Magnetic Challenger Kids choose from brightly colored m tic shapes to complete their design! 26 designed puzzle boards are consecutively lettered to show level of difficulty. Great for travel - metal box functions as stor container and design board! Excellent transition from MightyMind to SuperMind. Ideal for s 4 - 9 years old

name: MAGNETIC MM Sea Explorer
shortDetails: The only activity toy in the world that shows a child step-by-step how to build and solve puzzles.
description: MIGHTY MIND Magnetic Sea Explorer is a creative adventure activity that builds the skills that every child needs. It shows children how to build and solve colorful puzzles. Kids combine shapes and design blocks to create aquatic figures such as fish, sea creatures, boats and imaginative pictures.

name: MAGNETIC MM ZOO Adventure
shortDetails: Keep your children busy for hours as they use the small magnetic tiles to fill in the outlines of animals, each puzzle a little more challenging than the last. Builds critical thinking and spatial awareness. They claim this is 'the only activity toy in the entire world that shows a child step-by-step how to build and solve puzzles.' Designed for children ages 4-9.
description: Magnetic MightyMind® Zoo Adventure is an ideal travel companion for keeping kids creatively busy on long trips. This dramatic and colourful play-alone activity provides hours of fascinating fun by challenging children to think for themselves. Kids get totally absorbed as they follow the carefully programmed series of puzzles that build the skills every child needs. MightyMind Zoo Adventure provides the essential elements for developing independence and self-expression by encouraging children to accomplish tasks which are rewarding and build self-confidence. Includes 32 magnetic design tiles in 6 basic geometric shapes, 30 different puzzle boards, as well as a cards and storage bag.

name: Art House Blocks
shortDetails: Beautiful rainbow houses (6 piece) for small world play, nested in a wooden tray for easy storage, original design hand-crafted environmentally friendly children's building blocks toy home swing.
description: Now we're blockin'! Our 6-piece sets of rainbow coloured House Blocks by Avdar will take your open-ended play to a new level. Sort or stack them on their own, or combine them with other materials to create a whole neighbourhood of colourful fun. When it comes to beautiful, engaging wooden play materials, these montessori-inspired Rainbow House Blocks by Avdar really stack up! Choose our set of 6 blocks of varying sizes for an open-ended invitation to think outside the block. Wooden Tray size: 14 x 14cm (6 Piece Set) House Size: Approx 5cm (height) Materials: Lime wood, water-based non-toxic paint

name: Balance Blocks
shortDetails: Challenge yourself and your kid with these fabulous balancing blocks. They are great to develop fine motor skills, balancing, creative thinking and even problem-solving skills!
description: Our balance blocks are multi-faceted and beautifully coloured. The gem-like wooden pieces are unique for practicing stacking skills on top of each other to form precarious-looking towers or used as stones on a rural path. Great for developing fine motor and problem solving skills. Includes 10 coloured balancing blocks of various sizes. Made from limewood and coated with non-toxic, child friendly water-based paint.

name: Castle Block
shortDetails: This Castle Block Set is perfect for the children to create their very own palace, fortress or village! It has many shapes and patterns that help inspire imagination and creativity. The velvety finish and warm colour make this block set a unique set to keep! Wooden Base is included for storage and sorting.
description: Our most magnificent castle building blocks set in our collection thus far, its unique colour and innovative shapes help inspire creativity and imaginative play, as well as develop fine motor and balancing skills. It has rounded edges, making it perfect for small little hands, where children can see, touch and feel the wood's warm natural texture. Dimensions: 41 x 37cm Made from limewood and coated with non-toxic, child friendly water-based paint.

name: The Big Blocks
shortDetails: Big House Blocks can provide hours of imagination play, it is crafted beautiful high quality wood and carefully treated with non-toxic finish. The ideal building set includes every shape you could ever need, including stairs and a wave!
description: Our assorted wooden blocks come in a variety of colours and sizes, which allows for unlimited creativity in building. They are made in perfect sizes for gripping and stacking, which in turns help children develop sophisticated fine motor skills. Each set comes with a storage tray which can also be used as a base for building structures. Frame dimensions: 60 x 30cm Made from limewood and coated with non-toxic, child friendly water-based paint.

name: Connetix Tiles 2 Piece Base Plate
shortDetails: This new addition consists of 2 huge 4 x 4 plates, each equivalent to 16 individual squares. This is 4 times larger than the usual large plate included in the other bundles, and has magnets in the middle as well for building laterally.
description: This new addition consists of 2 huge 4 x 4 plates, each equivalent to 16 individual squares. This is 4 times larger than the usual large plate included in the other bundles, and has magnets in the middle as well for building laterally. We highly recommend this to help build larger structures! Recommended from 3 years, use with supervision at all times.  The 2-piece base plates set comes with: 2 base plates (measuring 4 x 4 of individual tiles) Colours are randomised.

name: Connetix Expansion Pack 40 Piece Square Set
shortDetails: Our 40 piece expansion set is a great way to build on your existing collection!
description: Our 40 piece expansion set is a great way to build on your existing collection! Each set includes: 4 x Large squares (6×6 inch) 2 Green & 2 Orange 36 x Small squares 6 of each colour
